list-item.p: Estimation of within-flock R 0 for LPAI infections using field data and a Bayesian hierarchical model based on the final size equation, provided below;
Estimation of the distribution of latent and infectious periods of LPAI in turkeys, using pre-existing data from experimental infections; and
Simulation of outbreaks using the estimates in points 1 and 2 and characterisation of LPAI outbreaks and their uncertainty (sensitivity analysis).
